title: ffmpeg fail, job commandline MacOS M1
body:
Hello :) 

I get an issue with the ffmpeg package.

(env) jbarbaud@Air-de-Jeremy DeepFaceLab_MacOS % bash scripts/2_extract_images_from_video_data_src.sh
[0] Enter FPS ( ?:help ) : 
0
[png] Output image format ( png/jpg ?:help ) : 
png
/!\ ffmpeg fail, job commandline:['ffmpeg', '-i', '/Users/jbarbaud/DeepFaceLab_MacOS/workspace/data_src.mp4', '-pix_fmt', 'rgb24', '/Users/jbarbaud/DeepFaceLab_MacOS/workspace/data_src/%5d.png']
Done.
(env) jbarbaud@Air-de-Jeremy DeepFaceLab_MacOS % bash scripts/3_extract_images_from_video_data_dst.sh
[0] Enter FPS ( ?:help ) : 
0
[png] Output image format ( png/jpg ?:help ) : 
png
/!\ ffmpeg fail, job commandline:['ffmpeg', '-i', '/Users/jbarbaud/DeepFaceLab_MacOS/workspace/data_dst.mp4', '-pix_fmt', 'rgb24', '/Users/jbarbaud/DeepFaceLab_MacOS/workspace/data_dst/%5d.png']
Done.


This version of DeepFaceLab is based on the Linux version but adapt for Mac M1.

Thanks for your help
